server.response
Interface ServerResponse

All Known Implementing Classes:
AttackResponse, CommandsResponse, DropResponse, EmoteResponse, GetResponse, GiveResponse, InventoryResponse, LookResponse, MoveResponse, OocResponse, QuitResponse, SayResponse, ScoreResponse, ShutdownResponse, SocialResponse, TellResponse, UnknownResponse, UseResponse, WhoResponse
public interface ServerResponse

This interface dictates a correct response from the Server to a Client. ServerResponse are externally associated with a Command.

Method Summary
 ClientMessage respond(ServerThread serverThread, java.util.List<java.lang.String> arguments)
          Dictates a a response to a Client from a given serverThread.
 

Method Detail

respond

ClientMessage respond(ServerThread serverThread,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> arguments)
Dictates a a response to a Client from a given serverThread. The response can use a list of arguments for the command in determining its response.

Parameters:
serverThread - ServerThread requesting this response
arguments - arguments passed from the client as part of the command, which can be used to determine an appropriate response
Returns:
response to be sent back to the client
